children.text: // Fall back to a simple fragment shader

frag: opt.frag || [
        'precision highp float;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_FragColor = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);',
        '}'
      ].join('\n')

opt.frag || [
        'precision highp float;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_FragColor = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);',
        '}'
      ].join('\n')
// Fall back to a simple vertex shader

vert: opt.vert || [
        'precision highp float;',
        'attribute vec3 position;',
        'varying vec2 vUv;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_Position = vec4(position.xyz, 1.0);',
        '  vUv = gl_Position.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;',
        '}'
      ].join('\n')

opt.vert || [
        'precision highp float;',
        'attribute vec3 position;',
        'varying vec2 vUv;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_Position = vec4(position.xyz, 1.0);',
        '  vUv = gl_Position.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;',
        '}'
      ].join('\n')

[
        'precision highp float;',
        'attribute vec3 position;',
        'varying vec2 vUv;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_Position = vec4(position.xyz, 1.0);',
        '  vUv = gl_Position.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;',
        '}'
      ].join('\n')

[
        'precision highp float;',
        'attribute vec3 position;',
        'varying vec2 vUv;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_Position = vec4(position.xyz, 1.0);',
        '  vUv = gl_Position.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;',
        '}'
      ].join

[
        'precision highp float;',
        'attribute vec3 position;',
        'varying vec2 vUv;',
        '',
        'void main () {',
        '  gl_Position = vec4(position.xyz, 1.0);',
        '  vUv = gl_Position.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;',
        '}'
      ]
// Send mesh vertex attributes to shader
